content: Task 1: Security Vulnerability Resolution - Fix 8 moderate vulnerabilities to improve health score from 72% to >90%
1.1 Write tests for dependency security validation
1.2 Update vulnerable dependencies (@braintree/sanitize-url, dompurify, esbuild, prismjs)
1.3 Verify security audit shows 0 moderate/high/critical vulnerabilities
1.4 Test application functionality after dependency updates
1.5 Verify all tests pass with updated dependencies
